price: Umunsi imitungo n’urubyaro bitazagira icyo bimarira (nyirabyo).
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا يَنفَعُ مَالٞ وَلَا بَنُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yawma lā yanfaʿu mālun walā banūna
